channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 7 Best Cheap Smartphones (2024): iPhone, Android, 5G
item.description: There’s little reason to pay top dollar for a smartphone. These iPhones and Android devices—ranging from $150 to $500—stood up to WIRED’s testing.

item.title: Apple cuts iPhone price in India amid China slowdown
item.description:
Apple has reduced prices of its iPhone models in India by 3-4% following a cut in import duties in the South Asian market. The price cuts range from 300 rupees ($3.63) for models like the iPhone 13, 14 and 15, and to up to 6,000 rupees ($72.54) for the iPhone 15 Pro and Pro Max […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Sonos Admits Its Recent App Update Was a Colossal Mistake
item.description: Owners of the company’s wireless speakers will have to endure the pain of broken software for several more months.

item.title: Egypt’s MNT-Halan banks $157.5M, gobbles up a fintech in Turkey to expand
item.description:
MNT-Halan, a fintech unicorn out of Egypt, is on a consolidation march. The microfinance and payments startup has raised $157.5 million in funding and is using the money in part to fund the acquisition of another fintech, Tam Finans, to expand into Turkey. Tam Finans provides financing to micro-enterprises and SMEs. It currently operates 39 […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Video Game Performers Are Going on Strike Over AI
item.description: The union representing the voice and motion-capture actors who work in video games authorized the strike after talks with gaming companies stalled over the use of AI.

item.title: Energy tech startup Greenely grabs €8M to reach more households and support Europe’s energy transition
item.description:
The energy transition is a marathon, not a sprint. But opportunities for acceleration are growing. Swedish startup Greenely* has just spotted one. It’s closing an €8 million Series A funding round to expand its energy management platform into neighbouring Nordic countries (so around $8.7M at current exchange rates). The energy tech startup is serving around […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Class Action Lawsuit Alleges T-Mobile Broke Its Lifetime Price Guarantee
item.description: Customers of the uncarrier want T-Mobile to pay up after switching their legacy phone plans for something more expensive.

item.title: Luxury fashion startup The Floorr empowers personal stylists with tools to grow their businesses
item.description:
The Floorr offers tools for conducting sales, hosting tailored styling sessions, creating mood boards, and engaging in text or voice chats with clients, all in one place. 

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: California Supreme Court Rules That Uber and Lyft Drivers Will Remain Independent Contractors
item.description: In a major victory for app-based companies, their drivers will not be considered employees.

item.title: Here’s why David Sacks, Paul Graham and other big Silicon Valley names had a brawl on X over VC behavior
item.description:
A decade-old drama involving VC David Sacks and Rippling founder Parker Conrad has blown up on X with many among the Silicon Valley elite taking sides.
